Directory.name: Directory

instanceMethods.name: constructor
instanceMethods.summary: Configures a new Directory instance, no files are accessed.
instanceMethods.description: Configures a new Directory instance, no files are accessed.

list.name: directoryPath
list.description: A {String} containing the absolute path to the directory

list.name: symlink
list.description: (optional) A {Boolean} indicating if the path is a symlink. (default: false)

returnValues.description: Returns the {String} basename of the directory.

instanceMethods.name: getFile
instanceMethods.summary:
Traverse within this Directory to a child File. This method doesn't
actually check to see if the File exists, it just creates the File object.
instanceMethods.description:
Traverse within this Directory to a child File. This method doesn't
actually check to see if the File exists, it just creates the File object.

list.name: filename
list.description: The {String} name of a File within this Directory.

instanceMethods.name: getSubdirectory
instanceMethods.summary:
Traverse within this a Directory to a child Directory. This method
doesn't actually check to see if the Directory exists, it just creates the
Directory object.
instanceMethods.description:
Traverse within this a Directory to a child Directory. This method
doesn't actually check to see if the Directory exists, it just creates the
Directory object.

list.name: dirname
list.description: The {String} name of the child Directory.

instanceMethods.name: isRoot
instanceMethods.summary:
Return a {Boolean}, true if this {Directory} is the root directory
of the filesystem, or false if it isn't.
instanceMethods.description:
Return a {Boolean}, true if this {Directory} is the root directory
of the filesystem, or false if it isn't.

returnValues.description: Returns this directory's completely resolved {String} path.
Returns whether the given path (real or symbolic) is inside this directory. This method does not actually check if the path exists, it just checks if the path is under this directory.
Returns the relative {String} path to the given path from this directory.

instanceMethods.name: getEntriesSync
instanceMethods.summary: Reads file entries in this directory from disk synchronously.
instanceMethods.description: Reads file entries in this directory from disk synchronously.

instanceMethods.name: getEntries
instanceMethods.summary: Reads file entries in this directory from disk asynchronously.
instanceMethods.description: Reads file entries in this directory from disk asynchronously.

list.name: callback
list.description: A {Function} to call with the following arguments:

Directory.summary: Represents a directory on disk that can be watched for changes.
Directory.description: Represents a directory on disk that can be watched for changes.

events.description:
### contents-changed

Public: Fired when the contents of the directory has changed.

File.name: File

list.name: filePath
list.description: A {String} containing the absolute path to the file

list.name: symlink
list.description: A {Boolean} indicating if the path is a symlink (default: false).

returnValues.description: Returns the {String} path for the file.

instanceMethods.name: getParent
instanceMethods.summary: Return the {Directory} that contains this file.
instanceMethods.description: Return the {Directory} that contains this file.

returnValues.description: Returns this file's completely resolved {String} path.

instanceMethods.name: getBaseName
instanceMethods.summary: Return the {String} filename without any directory information.
instanceMethods.description: Return the {String} filename without any directory information.

instanceMethods.name: write
instanceMethods.summary: Overwrites the file with the given text.
instanceMethods.description: Overwrites the file with the given text.

list.name: text
list.description: The {String} text to write to the underlying file.

instanceMethods.name: read
instanceMethods.summary: Reads the contents of the file.
instanceMethods.description: Reads the contents of the file.

list.name: flushCache
list.description: A {Boolean} indicating whether to require a direct read or if a cached copy is acceptable.

returnValues.description: Returns a promise that resovles to a String.
Returns a {Boolean}, true if the file exists, false otherwise.

instanceMethods.name: getDigest
instanceMethods.summary: Get the SHA-1 digest of this file
instanceMethods.description: Get the SHA-1 digest of this file

File.summary:
Represents an individual file that can be watched, read from, and
written to.
File.description:
Represents an individual file that can be watched, read from, and
written to.

events.description:
### contents-changed

Public: Fired when the contents of the file has changed.

### moved

Public: Fired when the file has been renamed. {::getPath} will reflect the new path.

### removed

Public: Fired when the file has been deleted.
